price: Solomon kaa sε: “Yεbεhwε sε, deε woreka no yε nokorε anaasε woka nkontompofoͻ no ho.
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
